name: Free Tools icon - 3D with editable colors
description:
LemiPop General Pack—Tools


As part of our General Icon Pack, here are the 3D Tools Icon pack that you can download and easily edit in Figma. All the colors are editable with well-organized layers. There are 2 angles in Figma which makes it easy to use. You can use these icon sets for Kid related presentations, UI designs, and even educational purposes.


Here is a list of the icons in this set:

  • Hammer 🔨
  • Handsaw 🪚
  • Mallet⚒️
  • Needlenose
  • Nut 🔩
  • Plunger 🪠
  • Screw x2 🔩
  • Screwdriver 🪛
  • Spirit level
  • Tape measure 📏


If you like the Blender, we also have a version in which we included the Blender file with 5 premade angels and a lighting setup ready to use for all icons!


Get the Blender version here.


BTW, PNG files are included! 😎
